document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Plated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">diversified </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">Gold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Silver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Pain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">prove </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">presence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Ore </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Particles </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Value </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">struggle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">exist </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">Power </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">proclaim </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Although </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Annihilation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">pile </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Chaoses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A plated life diversified
